r.s: Creating PDF on the fly with the PDFlib library
r.d:
This extension wraps the PDFlib programming library for processing PDF on the fly, created by Thomas Merz.
PDFlib is available under the PDFlib Lite License (http://www.pdflib.com/pdffiles/PDFlib-Lite-License.pdf) and for commercial licensing.
r.n: A major rework - supports PDFlib 5 and PDFlib 6 - adds an Object Oriented API to PDFlib (for PHP 5 only) - uses PHP exceptions (for PHP 5 only) - only official PDFlib API's are included (plus pdf_open_memory_image) - changed old API's with varargs to only accept all args now - disables VIRTUAL_DIR support (use SerachPath instead) - disables CHECK_OPEN_BASEDIR checks
